definition: to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn

sentences.english: Our grandmamas swung on them nooses.
sentences.chinese: 我们的祖母也被绞索绞死。

sentences.english: At that time you could hang for stealing .
sentences.chinese: 那时犯盗窃罪就可能会被绞死的。

sentences.english: There is more of killing a dog than by hanging.
sentences.chinese: 除绞死外，杀狗的方法可多着呢。

sentences.english: Louis Riel, the leader of the Métis was hanged for treason in 1885 for his leading role in resisting the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 瑞尔，因带头试图反抗联邦政府以叛国的罪名被绞死。

sentences.english: We must, indeed, all hang together or, most assuredly, we shall all hang separately.
sentences.chinese: 假使我们不团结在一起，我们将分开被绞死。

sentences.english: If they failed in their endeavors, they would have been hanged as traitors .
sentences.chinese: 如果他们的努力失败，他们会被当作叛国者绞死。

sentences.english: The risk of hanging an innocent person is too great, they say.
sentences.chinese: 他们说绞死一个无辜的人的可能性实在太大了。

sentences.english: Louis Riel, the leader of the Metis was hanged for treason in 1885 for his leading role in resisting the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 瑞尔，因带头试图反抗联邦政府以叛国的罪名被绞死。

sentences.english: While the tyrant was hanged, but they hang out and the US-British coalition forces.
sentences.chinese: 暴君虽然被绞死了，但是美英联军却赖着不走了。

sentences.english: There are more of killing a dog than by hanging.
sentences.chinese: 除绞死外，杀狗的方法可多着呢。

sentences.english: The thief was hanged at last.
He was hanged for plotting to supplant the king.
sentences.chinese: 他因阴谋篡夺皇位而被绞死。

sentences.english: We must hang together, or we'll be hanged seperately.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须拧成一股绳，否则我们将一个个被绞死。

sentences.english: We hung the likes of Reuther in Russia in 1917.
sentences.chinese: 在俄国象鲁瑟这样的人，在一九一七年都给绞死了。

definition: an execution/to put sb to death
to behead sb and display the head in public
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
to parade (a prisoner) through the streets
to execute by firing squad/to shoot dead/fig. to discard/to get rid of
